name: Moral Dilemma
description:
This was made in a week by two people for the Spooktober Game Jam. There may be many bugs and a lot of missing content so we aim to release a improved stable build in  a couple months time. 

Controls:

W to Jump

A to move Left

D to move Right

1, 2, 3, and 4 to change your active weapon

Left Click to use weapon
